remarks: The domain of the edge function is the union of the arguments/indices of all edges containing a specific vertex and the arguments/indices of all edges not containing this vertex.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Jan-2018.)
statement:
usgrafis.f $e |- F = ( E |` { x e. dom E | N e/ ( E ` x ) } ) $.
usgrafilem1 $p |- dom E = ( dom F u. { x e. dom E | N e. ( E ` x ) } ) $.
$d E x $.
$d N x $.
